Inputdata.name: File csv
Inputdata.desc: Handles csv, json, geojson or topjson files.

Inputdata.name: Paste
Inputdata.desc: Paste input: string, number, csv, json, geojson or topjson

Inputdata.name: HTTP Request
Inputdata.desc: Loads data via a http request.

Inputdata.name: Example Data
Inputdata.desc: Some example data for playing around with data blocks.

Transform.name: Filter
Transform.desc: Groups a data set based on a given column name.

Transform.name: Merge
Transform.desc: Merges two data sets based on the given column names.

Transform.name: Group
Transform.desc: Groups a data set based on a given column name.

Transform.name: Slice
Transform.desc: Slices a data set based on indices.

GeoData.name: Bounding Box
GeoData.desc: Calculates the bounding box of a given geojson.

GeoData.name: Centroid
GeoData.desc: Calculates the centroid of a given geojson.

GeoData.name: Area
GeoData.desc: Calculates the area in square meters of a given geojson.

Vis.name: Barchart
Vis.desc: Displays a bar chart of given x and y column names.

Vis.name: Histogram
Vis.desc: Displays a histogram of a given column name.

Vis.name: Scatterplot
Vis.desc: Displays a scatterplot of given x and y column names.

Vis.name: Time Series
Vis.desc: Displays a timeseries line chart of given x and y column names.

Misc.name: Stats
Misc.desc: Gives you min, max, avg, mean and count of a given column name.

Misc.name: Export
Misc.desc: Lets you export data as csv, json or geojson.
